title: 3 sec cd shield which scales with an offensive stat, huge AoE burst, hard CC and snowballs hard.
body: How is karma a balanced champion?

replies.body: Before I clicked on this I thought you were talking about Riven... and then I laughed.
As a long-time--since her release--Karma player, I resent this thread.

3.6 with max cdr/is the smallest shield you can give an ally Most shield scale with AP and that is more than an offensive stat,mantra q only hurts if you're a cripple,hardest snare to land in the game,doesn't snowball any more than other mages
try again.

> [{quoted}](name=Altimahnia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bL4XbaIR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-13T14:02:35.261+0000)
>
> 3.6 with max cdr/is the smallest shield you can give an ally Most shield scale with AP and that is more than an offensive stat,mantra q only hurts if you're a cripple,hardest snare to land in the game,doesn't snowball any more than other mages
> try again.

Smallest shield? 4 sec long 240base+50% ap scaling is a 600hp shield if you have 720 ap and it gives a 60% speed boost, is AoE and does damage.
 Mantra Q is impossible to miss and it has an 80% slow. 
How is a point+click ability hard to land? 
If she gets one kill, you won't be able to go back to lane. W+MantraQ+Ignite is enough to kill your opponent and you can't fail  since your opponent is snared.
was hoping this was a janna thread. her massive Q aoe dmg tho.

> was hoping this was a janna thread. her massive Q aoe dmg tho.

Ap Janna is also op. 

1700 range AoE 6sec cd nuke which is also a knockup, Point+Click slow which has a free MS passive, 6 Sec CD 5 sec long shield with 70% ap scaling which gives 122+ AD (if you have 720 ap) ***and*** an AoE Knockback that heals your whole team to full hp. Thankfully this cancer champion is not played on mid lane very often.
